name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Power Apps and Power Automate Old Designer Enforcer

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enforces the old designer interface in Power Apps and Power Automate cloudflows

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This unofficial Chrome extension automatically adds 'v3=false' to Power Apps and Power Automate cloudflows URLs, enforcing the use of the old designer interface.

Key Features:
- Modifies URLs for cloudflows in Power Apps and Power Automate
- Works in the background without user intervention
- Improves workflow for developers preferring the old designer

DISCLAIMER: This is an unofficial tool, not affiliated with or endorsed by Microsoft. Use at your own risk. While efforts have been made to ensure functionality, we cannot guarantee it will work as intended in all circumstances or continue to function if Microsoft makes changes. This extension may cause unintended effects on Power Apps and Power Automate functionality. It should not be relied upon for critical operations. The anonymous developers of this extension shall not be held liable for any damages or losses resulting from its use or inability to use. By installing this extension, you acknowledge that you understand and accept these terms.

Version: 1.0.0
Last updated: 2024-08-17
